overview: Entrepreneur More than 10 years in the IT field, with strong IT Consultative Sales for Infrastructure and software solutions; Also has strong IT Architectural knowledge (ITIL Certified), including hardware sizing, virtualization, and consolidation techniques, middleware, software consolidation and functional analysis skills. Working for major clients in the IT industry (including Banks and Telcos), building and leading highly technical cross platform groups, with responsabilities like budget analysis, planning and problem mitigation.
